item.title: How to fix "Temporary Failure in name resolution" in WSL
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to resolve the “Temporary failure in name resolution” issue in WSL by configuring DNS settings and ensuring persistent changes.
